TextBlock.Text: BETULA: Daucus, have you decided on a name for this planet yet?
ADONSONIA: I know you like easy solutions, but won't it be a bit easy to mix up you and the planet?
DAUCUS: I suppose I could name it Daucus' planet instead.
ALNUS: ...I suppose that calling the planet <color=orange>Daucus</color> works as well as anything.
